channel.title: RuneScape WebPage v1
channel.description:
Well this is basicly the css and html code taken out of RuneScape source code and alot of stuff removed and edited
Very easily editable not much credits given to me and jagex for the webpage only a simple link and words at the very bottom
Demo: http://xtras.ulmb.com/home.html
Pictures [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/g42t3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/5h3tg3.jpg[/img]
Im not sure if i will go furthur with it, maybe if i get some responses about it i will. There are more information and help within the download. E.g. information about adding new images and information about adding it to your webhost
Thanks guys. [hr]
shit, sorry i forgot the link. Ill add it in a sec
okay sorry about that heres the link: http://uppit.com/v/OL04SKO5

item.title: RuneScape WebPage v1
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

  1. NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED (e.g. tools)! This has never been allowed before, but hey, we decided to give it a go. The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers. If rules start to get broken and content gets out of hand, this rule will be revoked, and no longer will we allow non-server/non-client material to be posted.

I really don’t see how exactly this is related to RSPS, this is just a web page

Read full topic

[quote=“justinxg27, post:4, topic:308390”]Oh, nice and simple :)[/quote]Simplicity doesn’t compare to convenience. Editors are a necessity when programing anything.

[quote=“mod cody, post:7, topic:308390”]yea same
computer is too slow to run any editors :P[/quote]That’s ridiculous, I have nearly no RAM at all and I can run multiple script notations on an editor without any problems. Download this:

Download.com

EditPlus

You can edit text, HTML, and much more with EditPlus, a robust and capable text editor. The latest release of ES-Computing's EditPlus, version 3.5, adds
